attributes.action: Make all schools follow the same exam boards
attributes.additional_details: This will also help with students who have moved mid GCSE having to re-do coursework and etc in order to fulfill needs of the new school's exam board.
attributes.background: Exam boards such as OCR, Edexcel, and AQA differ in difficulty and specification however all provide grades 9-1, meaning a grade 6 is attained with more difficulty than one from AQA. Students should all follow the same spec throughout the UK in order for grades to be fair and equivalent.
